title: Neccton increases iGaming market dominance in Germany
description: Player protection specialists Neccton have increased their market dominance in Germany after reaching an agreement to provide their software to leading online operator NOVO INTERACTIVE GmbH.

title: Play North adopts Neccton’s mentor software
description: Malta-based Play North has become the latest igaming group to join the growing roster of firm’s to sign-up to utilise Neccton’s mentor player protection software

title: New academic study by Niklas Hopfgartner, Dr. Michael Auer and Dr. Mark Griffiths
description: Social Facilitation Among Gamblers:A Large-Scale Study Using Account-Based Data

title: ComeOn adds AML module to Neccton partnership
description: The ComeOn Group has announced an extension of its ongoing partnership with Neccton, by utilising the anti-money laundering module within the group’s mentor software package.

title: Neccton's Dr. Michael Auer featured on the title page of Intergaming
description: Dr. Michael Auer's article discusses the convergence between Responsible Gaming, AML and FRAUD

title: PlayOJO integrates mentor
description: The popular UK online-casino brand PlayOJO bolsters their RG with neccton's mentor
